# Demonstrate Quantmod

```{r package}

library(quantmod)
library(MTS)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)


```

```{r quantmod}

getSymbols("AMZN")
chartSeries(AMZN)
getSymbols("UNRATE", src = "FRED")
chartSeries(UNRATE)

```

```{r week 2}

set.seed(1069)
T2 <- 300
k2 <- 3
zt2 <- matrix(rnorm(T2*k2), T2, k2)

MTSplot(zt2)

ccm(zt2)

mq(zt2)

```
